name: Spectrum
description: Spectrum provides components and tools to help product teams work more efficiently, and to make Adobe’s applications more cohesive.

components.name: Combobox
components.definition: Combo boxes combine a text entry with a picker menu, allowing users to filter longer lists to only the selections matching a query.

components.name: Picker
components.definition: Pickers allow users to choose from a list of options in a limited space. The list of options can change based on the context.

components.name: Responsive Grid
components.definition: A responsive grid allows a layout to change dynamically based on the size of the screen. This also guarantees consistent layouts across Adobe’s products.
